SELECT di.mac, COUNT(*)*15 AS duration,p.country_code, p.area_code, p.city_code, d.code AS deviceName,p.cname AS placeName FROM device_image di,device d, place p
1=1 and di.mac=d.mac and d.place_id=p.id
and p.cname like CONCAT('%',#{placeName},'%')
and di.mac like CONCAT('%',#{mac},'%')
and d.code like CONCAT('%',#{deviceName},'%')
and di.create_time >= #{startTime}
and DATE_FORMAT(di.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endTime}
GROUP BY di.mac,p.country_code,p.area_code, p.city_code,d.code,p.cname

select di.id as id,di.mac as mac,a.title as name,a.video_path as videoPath,di.duration as duration,di.image_url,d.code as deviceName,p.cname as placeName,di.create_time from device_image di,device d,place p,advertisement a
1=1 and di.mac=d.mac and d.place_id=p.id and di.name=a.id
and p.cname like CONCAT('%',#{placeName},'%')
and di.mac like CONCAT('%',#{mac},'%')
and a.title like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and di.create_time >= #{startTime}
and di.create_time <= #{endTime}
order by di.create_time desc
